original_text: And their daughters they took to themselves for wives, and their own daughters they gave to their sons, and they served their gods.
korean_text: 그들의 딸들을 맞아 아내로 삼으며 자기 딸들을 그들의 아들들에게 주고 또 그들의 신들을 섬겼더라

sentences.original_text: And their daughters they took to themselves for wives
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그들의 딸들을 아내로 삼았다

sentences.original_text: and their own daughters they gave to their sons
